meanings.definition: Reviving or restoring life or consciousness.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed a resuscitative procedure to bring the patient back to life.
meanings.sent2: The resuscitative efforts of the medical team saved the drowning victim.
meanings.sent3: The resuscitative actions of the paramedics were like a superhero's powers.
meanings.sent4: Her resuscitative touch seemed to breathe life back into the wilted plant.
meanings.sent5: The resuscitative nature of the defibrillator made a dramatic impact on the patient's survival.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the act of reviving or restoring life or consciousness.
meanings.sent1: The resuscitative measures taken by the lifeguard were swift and effective.
meanings.sent2: The resuscitative equipment in the emergency room was crucial in saving lives.
meanings.sent3: The resuscitative response of the team was so quick that it felt like a well-rehearsed dance.
meanings.sent4: His resuscitative words breathed hope into the despondent crowd.
meanings.sent5: The resuscitative efforts of the firefighters were commendable during the rescue mission.
